title: American Workers Are Thriving Thanks To President Donald J. Trump’s Middle Class Tax Cuts – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
April 15, 2019
In everything we do and every action we take, we’re putting America first, and we are putting American workers first, for the first time in a long time.
						President Donald J. Trump					HELPING THE MIDDLE CLASS GET AHEAD: As President Donald J. Trump promised, the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) has delivered real savings for America’s middle class. MORE JOBS FOR AMERICAN WORKERS: President Trump’s tax cuts have generated more and more employment opportunities for American workers.BIGGER PAYCHECKS: The TCJA is helping to put more money in workers’ pockets through lower tax bills, rising wages, and big bonuses.
